Articles.Content:
Yes, not at all original for a name, but it's been a remarkable advance for my space program. To be able to see other planets myself for the first time without having to actually go there is a fantastic ability, and one that I intend to use much more often...

That said, to have a space telescope, you need to put it into orbit. And, experimenting with the newly updated Hullcam mod, I created this video of my launching of the Kubble Space Telescope...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HKRgDTRW0Dc
